name: iterm-write
description: Writes a command (or text) to the active iTerm terminal.
author: Shinkai

use_applescript.description: Use AppleScript for text input (macOS only, more reliable). Default: true

command.description: Text to write to active terminal. Enter key not sent unless text ends with newline

lines_output.description: Count of new lines that appeared in terminal after writing text

success.description: True if text was written to active terminal session, false if no session or write failed

message.description: Details about write operation result, includes error message if failed
